title: Tobacco Grater
provenance_text:
Edouard Chappey. (Possibly sold at Gallerie Georges Petit, Paris, France, May 27, 1907) [1]. (Sold at American Art Association, New York, NY, February 11, 1924); purchased by Herbert Dupuy [1856-1930], Pittsburgh, PA, February 11, 1924; gift to Department of Fine Arts, Carnegie Institute, Pittsburgh, PA, November 1927. 
NOTES: [1] The May 27 to May 31, 1907 sale of Edouard Chappey at Georges Petit includes a number of tabacco graters, however, many are included as a lot, without individual descriptions. It is possible that this item was included in lots 1345 to 1353, which were described as "Sous ces numéros, quinze rapes à tabac en ivoire oi os, à décors variés, des XVII et XVIII siécles. Seront divisées." Herbert DuPuy records that this item came from Chappey as well.
